data.title: Wikipedia founder Jimmy Wales on the NSA leaks – Cannes Lions 2013 video
data.meta_description: Cannes Lions: Wikipedia founder Jimmy Wales talks to John Plunkett about the implications of the National Security Agency leaks
data.text:
This article is more than 11 years old

Jimmy Wales talks to John Plunkett at the 2013 Cannes Lions International Festival of Creativity about the implications of the National Security Agency leaks and why the falling costs of computer processing power means widespread online data encryption is becoming a reality – which is bad news for the UK government's proposed 'snoopers charter'
